pages.schedule: Take a look at 2021 edition's schedule

banner.ticketsSignUp: Sign up to get your spot

info.welcome: Welcome to vOpen! One of the most important community organized set of technology events in Latin America.
info.mission: Our mission is to connect students, professionals, technical experts and organizations from around the globe to share knowledge, experiences and promote technological innovation.
info.history: Our history started as .NET Conf, and during the last 5 years we have carried out the conference in 4 countries, expanding to different topics: #GCP, #AWS, #Azure, #AlibabaCloud, #DevOps, #AI, #BusinessIntelligence, #Talent, #IoT, and much more.
info.today: Find out what happened in previous editions
info.sponsorship: Thanks to +200 organizations, vOpen is able to reach to many people for free. Check out our sponsorship packages that fit better for your business and your tech capabilities.
info.coronavirus: In light of the global situation due to the COVID-19, we are actively monitoring public health guidance in relation to in-person events. We won't take any decision lightly, but we will make any changes in the Schedule if recommended by the public authorities. Our top priority is the health and well-being of everyone.
info.newUser:
Thanks for registering.
You will get info about the conference and upcoming talks soon.
Stay connected!!!
